statements: ALTER TABLE BioinformaticsData ADD COLUMN description TEXT
ALTER TABLE BioinformaticsData MODIFY COLUMN organism VARCHAR(150)
ALTER TABLE BioinformaticsData DROP COLUMN gene_name
ALTER TABLE Genes ADD COLUMN description TEXT
ALTER TABLE Proteins ADD COLUMN name VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE Proteins DROP COLUMN sequence
ALTER TABLE Gene ADD COLUMN description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE Mutation DROP COLUMN position;
ALTER TABLE Variant MODIFY COLUMN effect VARCHAR(500);
ALTER TABLE genes ADD COLUMN gene_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE transcripts ADD COLUMN exon_count INT DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE patients ADD COLUMN blood_type VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT 'Unknown';
ALTER TABLE gene_info ADD COLUMN gene_type VARCHAR(20);
ALTER TABLE protein_info DROP COLUMN sequence;
ALTER TABLE mutation_info MODIFY COLUMN mutation_description VARCHAR(255);
